# Themes

# Default

<vue-good-table
  :columns="columns"
  :rows="rows">
</vue-good-table>
1
2
3
4
NameAgeCreated OnPercent
John20Jul 2nd 113.34%
Jane24Oct 31st 113.34%
Susan16Oct 30th 113.34%
